Value.label: Make SEI blink
Value.Help: Configuration Value 1 is to Specify the time that SEI need blink (0-255), the unit is second; Configuration Value 2 is to Specify the Cycle of on/off (0-255), the unit of it is 0.1 second.

Value.label: Current Overload Protection
Value.Help: Load will be closed when the Current overruns (EU 16.2A) for more than 2 minutes

Value.label: Notification status
Value.Help: Defines the automated status notification of an associated device when status changes

Value.label: Minimum Change to send Report (Watt)
Value.Help: The value represents the minimum change in wattage for a Report to be sent (default 25 W)

Value.label: Minimum Change to send Report (%)
Value.Help: The value represents the minimum percentage change in wattage for a Report to be sent (Default 5)

Value.label: Default Group Reports
Value.Help: Set report types for groups 1, 2 and 3 to default.

Value.label: Report type sent in Reporting Group 1
Value.Help:
Defines the type of report sent for reporting group 1. 2 is multisensor report. 4 is meter report for watts. 8 is meter report for kilowatts. Value 1 (msb) Reserved Value 2 Reserved Value 3 Reserved Value 4(lsb) bits 7-4 reserved bit 3 MRC(KWH) bit 2 MRC(watt) bit 1 MSRC bit 0 reserved
The MRC(KWH) flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0) Meter Report Command(KWh) automatically.
The MRC(Watt) flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0) Meter Report Command(wattage) automatically.
The MSRC flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0) Multilevel Sensor Report Command(wattage) automatically.

Value.label: Report type sent in Reporting Group 2
Value.Help:
Defines the type of report sent for reporting group 2. 2 is multisensor report. 4 is meter report for watts. 8 is meter report for kilowatts. Value 1 (msb) Reserved Value 2 Reserved Value 3 Reserved Value 4 lsb) bits 7-4 reserved bit 3 MRC(KWH) bit 2 MRC(watt) bit 1 MSRC bit 0 reserved
The MRC(KWH) flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0) Meter Report Command(KWh) automatically.
The MRC(Watt) flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0) Meter Report Command(wattage) automatically.
The MSRC flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0) Multilevel Sensor Report Command(wattage) automatically.

Value.label: Report type sent in Reporting Group 3
Value.Help:
Defines the type of report sent for reporting group 3. 2 is multisensor report. 4 is meter report for watts. 8 is meter report for kilowatts. Value 1 (msb) Reserved Value 2 Reserved Value 3 Reserved Value 4 (lsb) bits 7-4 reserved bit 3 MRC(KWH) bit 2 MRC(watt) bit 1 MSRC bit 0 reserved
The MRC(KWH) flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0) Meter Report Command(KWh) automatically.
The MRC(Watt) flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0) Meter Report Command(wattage) automatically.
The MSRC flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0) Multilevel Sensor Report Command(wattage) automatically.

Value.label: Set 111-113 to default
Value.Help: Set time interval for sending reports for groups 1, 2 and 3 to default.

Value.label: Send Interval for Reporting Group 1
Value.Help: Defines the time interval when the defined report for group 1 is sent.

Value.label: Send Interval for Reporting Group 2
Value.Help: Defines the time interval when the defined report for group 2 is sent.

Value.label: Send Interval for Reporting Group 3
Value.Help: Defines the time interval when the defined report for group 3 is sent.
